facts: Primary colors (red, blue, yellow) cannot be created by mixing other colors.
Secondary colors are created by mixing two primary colors.
Complementary colors are opposite each other on the color wheel.
Mixing complementary colors creates neutral tones (browns and grays).
The RGB color model is additive - combining all colors makes white.
The CMY color model is subtractive - combining all colors makes black.
Hex codes represent colors using 6 digits: RRGGBB (Red, Green, Blue).
Each hex digit ranges from 0-9 and A-F (0-15 in decimal).
